title: How to make 7,000 a year as a 13-year-old - Quora

response.answer_text: Have access to the internet, Become self aware of how you're using your time and what expenses you have and start Compounding the money that you make by reselling by creating content that benefits others either a skill or a talent. And the biggest most important part get on YouTube and educate yourself and work on your focus.
